items.sentence: Tom wanted to keep walking, but Mary insisted that they stop and rest.
Tom didn't get anything handed to him. He actually had to work for it.
Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds.
Tom has a picture of a beautiful girl in a bikini on his bedroom wall.
How are you doing? It's been a long time since we last met, hasn't it?
Tom ran into the church to get away from the mob that was chasing him.
The hunter remained very still waiting for the deer to come into view.
A very handsome man just came in the door with a very beautiful woman.
Tom had no idea that Mary was standing outside the door and listening.
Have you recently felt any unexplained pain or stiffness in your neck?
